amendment.description: To reauthorize the Second Chance Act of 2007.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3435 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3435 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Capito to Amendment SA 3748. To reauthorize the Second Chance Act of 2007.
